config.timestamp.column.name: MODIFIEDTS
config.query: SELECT CAST(m.PK AS NUMBER(13)) AS ID, CAST(m.P_MEDIACONTAINER AS NUMBER(13)) AS CONTAINER_ID, mf.P_QUALIFIER AS QUALIFIER, CASE WHEN m.P_LOCATION IS NULL THEN '' ELSE 'https://www.harryrosen.com/medias/sys_master/'||m.P_LOCATION END AS IMAGE_PATH, m.MODIFIEDTS FROM HARP.MEDIAS m JOIN (SELECT P_QUALIFIER, PK FROM HARP.MEDIAFORMAT) mf ON m.P_MEDIAFORMAT = mf.PK
